text:
Loop54 | Stockholm | ONSITE | https://loop54.com/

Loop54 is a search engine as-a-service, marketed primarily toward the small–medium–large segment of the e-commerce market. We can probably achieve the most relevant results in the world for our client base right now, through what's fundamentally pretty basic AI techniques[1].

We have a lot of ideas on how to improve the service further – in terms of relevance, predictability, availability, analysis, usability, and a million other things. Unfortunately, this will only be possible with additional brains on deck.

Open roles:

- Backend Developer: We'd like to expand our team with an intelligent, friendly, and highly skilled backend developer. https://careers.loop54.com/jobs/46910-backend-developer-ai-s...

- Frontend Developer: We're looking for someone to be an authority on the entire frontend from concept through design to implementation. https://careers.loop54.com/jobs/46989-frontend-developer-ana...

[1]: What the AI does for us is let us generalize over visitor behaviour, such that each individual action is less important, and the general sentiment of the users is what counts.
